description: An attractive and well-designed version of the classic game.
UX, graphics and gameplay are well done but something about the program is repeatedly causing disk errors even with the most recent Ubuntu LTS. Had to uninstall due to the issues.
summary: Good design but causing disk errors

description: I love to play it but it seems like I hit the wrong key often and there is no way to take it back. Like, someone played a diamond, perfect place to drop the queen of spades, but I hit the king instead.  Come on, too frustrating.
summary: Love it, add a redo feature

description: I can't believe a game this simple and it can still crash.
Game looks good, easy to play. In off-line version the types of cards being passed (or not passed) are predictable, which makes it pretty easy to win. Not a contest.
App imnstalls and opens, but after closing and reopening cannot start a game
summary: Doesn't work in Link Mint 20.3 Cinnamon

description:
The game doesn't use the standard card hierarchy (hearts, clubs, diamonds and spades) .
It re-sort the card during the game.
It remove the played hand automatically (it should wait for a click)
And I don't like the graphics.
summary: The worst edition of that game I've ever seen

description: ne fonctionne pas sur ubuntu jammy jellyfish
